attributes.action: Drop the recently unveiled logo for the 2012 olympics.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I was dismayed to see on the news that the simple but stylish and effective "thames ribbon" logo for the 2012 Olympic games as seen here...
http://www.bbc.co.uk/radio2/shows/vine/media/london2012.jpg

has been replaced by something that looked like it was designed by a small child and will be a global embarrasment for the UK for years to come. 

http://main.london2012.com/NR/rdonlyres/66925BAB-8252-4B26-B8DE-7D1682170A08/0/newlogo_390x220.jpg

I shudder to think how much money was spent in coming up with this design , but it was a total waste of money.

If you would like to see them revert to the original design , please sign this petition

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
